snippet: When Liberty Island was still known as Bedloes Island, a small group of families of service members stationed at Fort Wood lived in the shadow of the Statue of Liberty.
abstract: When Liberty Island was still known as Bedloes Island, a small group of families of service members stationed at Fort Wood lived in the shadow of the Statue of Liberty.

headline.main: Recalling Childhoods Spent Romping Under the Statue of Liberty's Gaze
